LanguageData.Hediffs_MedicineLv1.label: Medicinal Expertise Lv.1
LanguageData.Hediffs_MedicineLv1.description: Ijutsu (Medicine/Healing Art) Tip 1: The Level 1 and 2 buff of this skill may be activated by simple meals, luxury items, and processed foods.
LanguageData.Hediffs_MedicineLv2.label: Medicinal Expertise Lv.2
LanguageData.Hediffs_MedicineLv2.description: Ijutsu (Medicine/Healing Art) Tip 2: Buffs can be attained for all vanilla skill types (plants, animals, construction, etc).
LanguageData.Hediffs_Medicine.label: Medicinal Expertise
LanguageData.Hediffs_Medicine.description: Ijutsu (Medicine/Healing Art): I eat with gratitude for all the ingredients in the world!\nKnowledge is power, and what better way to learn than to eat, eat, eat! Kanpai!
LanguageData.Hediffs_Medicine.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.Hediffs_Medicine.stages.1.label: Lv.3
